content.description: A pair of charged particles having charges <math alttext="positive 2 Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="positive Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> are arranged along a line, as shown in the figure above.
content.question: At which of the labeled positions is the electric potential highest?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
